content: In an Excel table called "Diseases", there is a column named "Description" that contains various descriptions of diseases. One of the descriptions is "A rare autoimmune disorder that attacks the peripheral nervous system". Can you identify the disease from this description?

The description "A rare autoimmune disorder that attacks the peripheral nervous system" is likely referring to Guillain-Barré Syndrome (GBS). Guillain-Barré Syndrome is a rare neurological disorder in which the body's immune system mistakenly attacks the peripheral nerves, leading to muscle weakness and, in some cases, paralysis.
